attributes.action: Use enviable NHS facilities to train and export expatriate Doctors and Nurses.
attributes.additional_details:
Post-Brexit, Politicians should work together and mobilise the people, to come up with ideas to supported Britain. 
Parliament should discuss how 
our world class NHS, can be leveraged to support the economy. 
Start training more Medical personnel. After meeting NHS needs, produce surplus Doctors and Nurses with NHS facilities to export to the world labour market to generate foreign earnings.
Use our competitive advantage we should not import this service when we can export it!
attributes.background: With Brexit everyone in the UK should be thinking and suggesting how Britain can use all her resources and competitive advantage in the Healthcare sectors to support her economy through export.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
